--- Kenneth Stanley <kstanley@...> wrote:
> Actually I think it's more complicated than this. 
> There are two 
> cases: 1) Where the compatibility threshold is
> fixed, and 2) Where 
> the compatibility threshold is dynamically adjusting
> to attain a 
> goal # of species.

And you've done experiments both ways, correct?  Did
you find one approach to be more effective than the
other, or did it depend on the domain?

Derek
